features: EXTRA LARGE: 63x48inch. The most popular pattern lends a beautiful rich decor element to your home, light up your reading corner, movie room, children playing room, yoga corner, etc.

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS: Made of polyester environmental material with skid proof bottom. Unique fiber-locking technique and neatly wrapped sides, not easy to get hair loss or off line， which make your mat stand the test of time, durable and sturdy.
NON SKID/NON OFF LINE: Ultra soft. Special non-slip latex particles design at bottom, preventing dislocation to provide good protection for your family, especial your kids.

WIDE APPLICATION: Perfectly suitable for your busy home or office with kids, pets, visitors and heavy traffic areas like in the Kitchen/ Living Room/ Sleeping Room/ Garden/ Outdoor/ Indoor/ Floor/ Garage Entry/ Front Entrance/ Hallway/ Aisle/ Passageway/ Drawing Room/ Balcony/ Reception Room/ Office/ Laundry/ Celebration/ Vacation Home/ Dorm Room/ Vacation Home/ Guest Suite/ Pets/ Dining Room/ Bedroom/ Hotel/ Bathroom/ Wedding. As well as a perfect gift to your lovers!
EASY CARE: These soft and elegant rugs are easy to clean. Vacuum regularly and spot clean. Can be washed in washing machine.
description: Our floor mat rug perfect put at home under a coffee table or table, beside sofa or bed, a small dining set, in a kitchen, or an entryway, offers luxurious comfort and versatile furnishing options style to any room and place.FEATURES:♛ Premium Materials: high quality polyester latex skid proof bottom.♛ Large Size: 63 x 48 inch (Length x Width). All our rugs are custom made. You can contact us if you need other sizes.♛ Fits Into a Range of Styles - contemporary, farmhouse, coastal, rustic, casual, and transitional.♛ Easy to clean, stain resistant, and does not shed.Create a cozy area to lounge in while reading your favorite books or watching your favorite tv shows.Create a safe and comfortable space for your kids, guests and pets.Convert your house into a home with a finishing touch by simply setting one rug from this collection under your kitchen table, in your living room or by your foyer to greet your guests in a gracefully.Note:1. Due to size limits of courier, we have to fold it before shipping. Please don't worry, folding crease will disappear for 2~3 days after laying on the floor.2. Due to the differences of displays, there may be a slight color deviation between the actual color and pictures you see, we keep them as true to life as much as possible.3. Due to the manual measurement and different measurement methods, please allow 1-3cm deviation.
